Package net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth

The base classes for providing authentication.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthDataStore
    DataStore interface for authentication.
    Realm
    Authentication realm.
    Role
    Vistor role.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoRememberMeServices
    Automatically create an authenticated principal tied to a browser cookie or authenticates using a cookie.
    DigestAuthenticationHelper
    Helper class for digest authentication method.
    HibernateUserDetailsService
    Provides UserDetailsService by loading relevant Hibernate entities.
    RealmImpl
    This method describes an authentication realm.
    RemoteUserRequestWrapper
    Provides the remote user information as determined by the authentication.
    RoleImpl
    Defines a role.
    UserPrincipal
    Principal object for an authenticated user.
    UserSecret
    Defines a user-secret pair for authentication.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthenticationMethod
    enumeration of authentication methods.
    DigestAlgorithm
    enumeration of digest authentication algorithms.

Package net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth Description

The base classes for providing authentication. The filter implementation is the AuthFilter class.
